name: hello (Maker School)
description:
D- move forward
A- to move back
W-to jump (or you could use the space bar)
When you play my game hello you need to grab the coins to earn more points and you need to grab the lives to survive for longer, so if you fall down a hole and you have lives left you are still in the game but once you have run our of lives and you fall down a hole you will have to start the game again. Try to avoid falling off of any bricks or falling through holes through out the game. At the start of the game you will have three lives and once you have reached the end of the level you will find a black and white brick which leads you to the next level.
